title: Russia Is Urged to Rejoin Grain Deal as Hunger Warnings Mount
description: Moscow dismissed accusations that it was using food as a weapon and said Ukraine was to blame for its decision to suspend an agreement that allowed for grain shipments.
dc:creator: Shashank Bengali, Abdi Latif Dahir and Natalie Kitroeff
media:credit: Daniel Berehulak for The New York Times
media:description: A cargo vessel laden with grain destined for Ethiopia prepared to set off in August from Port Pivdennyi in Ukraine.
